news.content: Hashdump meetings for the Fall 2019 semester are over! We'll see you again on January 28th, when our first meeting of the Spring semester begins. Many thanks to all of our members who participated and made this semester awsome: there are many more great things in store!
Representing CSU, Hashdump's team at the Department of Energy Cyberforce Competition placed a cool 69th out of the entire country! Nice.

Hashdump particpates in the Rocky Mountain Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (RMCCDC) each year - if you are interested in being a part of our team for the 2020 competition occuring in March, take a look at the sign up sheet here!
